itunes:title: Episode 785 - Special Guest Professional Poker Player Maria Konnikova
title: Episode 785 - Special Guest Professional Poker Player Maria Konnikova
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by Maria Konnikova — a journalist and New York Times bestselling author turned (successful) professional poker player — to discuss her transition from professional writer to professional gambler, how her Ivy Lea...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by Maria Konnikova — a journalist and New York Times bestselling author turned (successful) professional poker player — to discuss her transition from professional writer to professional gambler, how her Ivy League psychology degree gives her an edge at the table, what her poker mentor Erik Seidel taught her and how he had her train to become a pro, and what Maria endured when she first tried to enter the male-dominated world of professional poker as a novice and a woman.
